description: Try our easy to follow Lasagne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lasagne,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Sesame free,Beef
name: Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g extra tomato, onion & roast garlic sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Brown 500g of the mince and add jar of tomato sauce. Stir and simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from heat. Add grated carrot.

Place a layer of the mince mixture into your oven dish. Cover with a layer of lasagne pasta sheets and then a layer of lasagne bechamel sauce. Repeat the layering process with the remaining ingredients, finishing with a sprinkling of grated cheese.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until cooked and golden brown. Allow to stand for a few minutes, then serve with fresh salad leaves.
